TLSError

Error
TLSError

TLSError

A error that can be thrown when something wrong happens in the TLS protocol.  This is handled in TLSEngine by generating a TLS ALERT as appropriate.  Copyright © 2007 Henri Torgemane

See LICENSE.txt for full license information.
